divs: sighting detailsi was driving home on swamp road after leaving bucks county community college around 9pm on 1\24\2012 when i observed what first looked like a low flying plane the size of a small jetliner due to its 3 white lights. it appeared to be turning about 30-40 degress. it seemed to be running parallel to swamp road. i thought it was odd, it is not in the flight path for mercer county airport, nj. as i drove closer, i thought that it could not be a plane but a helicopter because it was flying way too slow! it was about 300 - 500 ft it the sky, no more than 1\2 mile away. within the 3 lights there seemed to be interior lights with the structure. i have never seen anything like it. i came to a stop light and rolled down my window as it was passing to take a listen to it ... it was not a jet or a helicopter, it sounded like a electronic humming fan or turbine blades ... i was on a aircraft carrier for 5 years ... no plane i have ever heard. i came home and googled ufo bucks county after remembering sighting years ago. [link moved to fi section\cms\tg] ... this looks like what i saw but from more of a side view and it was not that high in the air ... the 3 lights were white not red. the strange thing is that mufon had a meeting at bccc on 1\24\2009. i have never seen anything like it. i love it.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Newtown
There were no other sightings in Newtown on or around January 24th 2012
Summary: 3 white lights turned like a plane but was moving too slow ... interior lights within diamond or triangular structure
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
